itunes:title: Episode 665 - Special Guest Dakota Meyer
title: Episode 665 - Special Guest Dakota Meyer
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with Medal Of Honor Recipient Dakota Meyer to discuss the chaos that's going on in America and how he thinks we can fix it.  We chat about the recent events in Kenosha, WI and why everyone protesting in the street...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with Medal Of Honor Recipient Dakota Meyer to discuss the chaos that's going on in America and how he thinks we can fix it.  We chat about the recent events in Kenosha, WI and why everyone protesting in the streets was wrong, why Jacob Blake isn't a hero, and why Kyle Riddenhouse shouldn't have been there.  Dakota also discusses why he recently became a firefighter, and his answer will surprise you.
